name: Piramide
additionalNotes:
The "Reyes Flower" cigar is a handmade, box pressed cigar. It is a medium bodied cigar, crafted from a fine selection of Dominican and Nicaraguan tobaccos. It is long filled with Dominican binders and finished with a Sumatra wrapper for a taste of the old world.

ALL DETAILS APPLY TO THE OTHER FOUR VITOLAS ALREADY POSTED. FILL IN BLANK SPACES!
